review: She treated very well, and explained excellent she gives a hope to my wife. My wife  was very happy. Before consulting my wife has feared a lot After consulting Dr Anuradha medam, my wife was very happy and scared has gone. I Definitely Referred to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been Dr Anuradha mam for my regular pregnancy check from 5th month till my delivery.She was really friendly and did not suggest me any  unecessary medications, and encouraged me throughout my pregnancy journey ..On her advice i deliverd a healthy girl baby on August 23 2023,I really thankful for Anuradha mam and Cloudnine malleshwaram for making my motherhood happy and fruitful..

Doctor explained clearly and she had patience to explain all our doubts and I was convinced with her explanation 
She is a good and efficient doctor.

review: She absolutely does not care about you or your baby, she will not spend more than 5 minutes with you discussing anything. she will want you to get out of her room at the earliest.

review: Dr. Anuradha is friendly and the best doctor I recommend ever. She listens and understands the patient's needs then provide a solution. Overall I'm very happy with the treatment.
